creator: flop.m@usa.net
text:
Please find attached a factory for creating and storing java.net.URL objects
inside the JNDI of Tomcat

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
There has been no demand for this from other users so I am resolving this as WONTFIX.

The patch remains available for those users that do want this feature.

There is always the option to review the WONTFIX resolution if there is sufficient user demand.
